83488.summary: Some customers in the areas of Langley, Abbotsford, and Aldergrove are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83488.title: Sept 30 - Langley, Abbotsford, Aldergrove | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

83503.summary: Some customers in the Norwood East area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83503.title: Oct 1 - Winnipeg (Norwood East) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
